data.title: Metagenomic characterization of the human gut virome in health and disease
data.abstract: The human gut virome plays a critical role in shaping microbial communities and host immunity. This study provides a comprehensive metagenomic characterization of viral populations in the human gastrointestinal tract, revealing extensive diversity and novel viral lineages associated with disease states.

data.title: Soil virome dynamics reveal bacteriophage-driven nutrient cycling
data.abstract: Bacteriophages are major drivers of nutrient cycling in soil ecosystems. Through virome analysis of diverse soil samples, we demonstrate that phage-mediated lysis contributes significantly to carbon and nitrogen turnover in terrestrial environments.

data.title: Crystal structure of a novel zinc finger protein complex
data.abstract: We report the crystal structure of a novel zinc finger protein complex at 1.8 angstrom resolution. The structure reveals an unusual binding mode that may inform drug design.
